attributes.review:

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and opened it to see a weird looking cheetoh puff oompaloompa staring at me and smiling, this is unacceptable! I downloaded this app to get updates from bunker boy not to be scared by an orange oompaloompa! The utter disappointment and disrespect I got form this app is astonishing! 1 Star
attributes.title: Scary

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever gotten. There is a rapist on the first screen that pops up. That should not be allowed on an app. Please take this off the App Store so other children don’t have their eyes scarred for life. Thank you!

attributes.review: I read that this apps software breaks down other people’s phones and ruins them. Regardless this app is trash because of the content that it provides. Don’t download it.

attributes.review: got this app to support my 🍊orange 🍊 role model, but when i did, it sensed i was mexican and told me to kill myself in 45 different languages. wouldn’t recommend. i need ✨extensive ✨ emotional help after my 🌎 president 🌎 said that 2 me.

attributes.review: I think the title of this review should speak for itself. I am appalled at how awful this app is. It runs slow, always crashes, and keeps showing me images of an Orange man🤮
